thoughts.text: I suggest executing the following command to move all files to the 'auto_gpt_workspace' directory, while excluding the directory itself:
thoughts.reasoning: This command will use the 'rsync' command to copy all files and directories from the current directory to the 'auto_gpt_workspace' directory, excluding the 'auto_gpt_workspace' directory itself. It will then delete all files and directories from the current directory.
thoughts.plan:
- Execute the following command:
rsync -a --exclude=auto_gpt_workspace ./* auto_gpt_workspace && rm -r ./*
thoughts.criticism: I should have double-checked the syntax of the 'rsync' command before suggesting it.
thoughts.speak: I suggest executing the following command to move all files to the 'auto_gpt_workspace' directory, while excluding the directory itself: rsync -a --exclude=auto_gpt_workspace ./* auto_gpt_workspace && rm -r ./*
